mapper.select:
/* kr.go.bai.eip.cor.cor.dao.COR002009PMapper.COR002009PMainSelect */
SELECT A.REQ_DVSN_CD ,A.ACP_YR ,A.CVPT_ACP_NO ,B.DOC_SEN_HIS FROM TBCORCOR101M A ,TBCORCOR201M B WHERE 1=1 AND A.REQ_DVSN_CD = #{reqDvsnCd} AND A.ACP_YR = #{acpYr} AND A.CVPT_ACP_NO = #{cvptAcpNo} AND A.REQ_DVSN_CD = B.REQ_DVSN_CD AND A.ACP_YR = B.ACP_YR AND A.CVPT_ACP_NO = B.CVPT_ACP_NO
